round_best: Develop an adaptive generative model that combines graph-based scene representation with conditional diffusion models to enhance the generation of dynamic, complex driving scenarios. The model would leverage a graph-based framework to articulate the spatial relationships and interactions between various objects in a scene (e.g., vehicles, pedestrians, traffic lights) and use this structure to guide the diffusion process in generating temporally coherent and contextually diverse scenes over extended periods. This approach would allow for the creation of longer, continuous video sequences by predictively modeling scene evolution based on both learned traffic patterns and new, improvised interactions, improving the system's ability to handle unseen corner cases.
